name: Crystal Thief
description:
Controls -

Movement - WASD

Interact - E

Objective - Enter the warehouse, steal the crystals, get out.

Backstory -

Your organisation, [REDACTED], has sent you to a mysterious warehouse in the hills of [REDACTED], owned by your arch enemies and rival organisation, EGI. You have been tasked with silently entering the compound, stealing the powerful crystals and escaping, to contribute to an unknown project, which is nicknamed "The Cataclysm" by the public, due to the fear of what the crystals are capable of. Notes have been left in and around the warehouse by a scout, informing you of what to do if you are unsure.
